data.name: Star-Lord (T'Challa)
data.description: Star-Lord (T'Challa) is the idealistic Ravager outlaw who uses gadgets, charm, and fancy footwork to embolden his allies, take power from the powerful, and stylishly defeat those who threaten his friends.

starItems.name: Star-Lord (T'Challa)
starItems.description: Star-Lord (T'Challa) is the idealistic Ravager outlaw who uses gadgets, charm, and fancy footwork to embolden his allies, take power from the powerful, and stylishly defeat those who threaten his friends.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
Always apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy from that target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy from the target.

This attack is Unavoidable.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy from the target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy from that target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if Yondu is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if Yondu is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies instead.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy from that target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy from that target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if Yondu is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies instead.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, steal up to <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy from that target.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

2.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Increase the duration of all positive effects for self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

3.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

Increase the duration of all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, for self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from adjacent allies

4.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.

Increase the duration of all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, for self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

5.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

Increase the duration of all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, for self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from adjacent allies

6.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>430%</color> damage.

Increase the duration of all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, for self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Copy all positive effects from adjacent allies

7.description:
Copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from adjacent allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>530%</color> damage.

Increase the duration of all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, for self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

1.description: On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

2.description:
On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
2.nextUpgrade: On non-summoned enemy death, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Speed Bar

3.description:
On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

On non-summoned enemy death, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Speed Bar.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health

4.description:
On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

On non-summoned enemy death, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Speed Bar.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health

5.description:
On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

On non-summoned enemy death, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Speed Bar.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
